name.str: pair of 2-by-arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of 2-by-arm guards

description: A pair of improvised arm guards made from broken pieces of a plank that are tied to your arms with rags and string.  They offer good protection, but are really uncomfortable to wear.

name.str: pair of carpet arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of carpet arm guards

description: Small squares of carpet rolled around your upper and lower arms.  Armor of the truly desperate or crafty.
//: The weight assumes four squares of carpet of about 25cm x 20cm.

name.str: pair of carpet bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of carpet bracers

description: Small squares of carpet rolled around your lower arms.  The bare minimum to hopefully stop a bite or two.
//: The weight assumes two squares of carpet of about 25cm x 20cm.

name.str: pair of chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.

name.str: pair of XL chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL chitin arm guards

name.str: pair of XS chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS chitin arm guards

name.str: pair of biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle.

name.str: pair of XL biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL biosilicified chitin arm guards

name.str: pair of XS biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS biosilicified chitin arm guards

name.str: pair of cloth-padded sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of cloth-padded sleeves

description: The sleeves of a thick cotton shirt, with a bunch of cloth sewn in to act as extra padding.  They're quite lonely, no longer being attached to each other by the rest of the shirt.

name.str: pair of hard arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hard arm guards

description: A pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.

name.str: pair of XL hard arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL hard arm guards

name.str: pair of XS hard arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS hard arm guards

name.str: pair of leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of leather arm guards

description: A pair of tough leather arm guards.  Light and comfortable.

name.str: pair of XL leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL leather arm guards

name.str: pair of XS leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS leather arm guards

name.str: pair of steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of steel arm guards

description: A full assembly of medieval arm protection.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name.str: pair of XL steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL steel arm guards

name.str: pair of XS steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS steel arm guards

name.str: pair of sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal, avoiding joints.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 25cm x 20cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened steel sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened steel sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from sheet metal, hardened for extra protection.  Still manages that Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.

name.str: pair of mild steel sheet metal bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel sheet metal bracers

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal, only covering your forearms.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 25cm x 20cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened steel sheet metal bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened steel sheet metal bracers

description: A pair of forearm guards hammered out from sheet metal, hardened for extra protection.

name.str: pair of mild steel sheet metal pauldrons
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel sheet metal pauldrons

description: Two half-cylinders of sheet metal jutting out over your shoulders and two more underneath.  They make it impossible to raise your arms fully, but they'll keep your arms attached to you.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal pauldrons
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal pauldrons

description: A pair of crude pauldrons made out of sheet metal and hardened for reinforcement.

name.str: pair of mild steel sheet metal elbow guards
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel sheet metal elbow guards

description: Two small half-cylinders of sheet metal cut down and hammered to fit over your elbows.  Very brutal, just needs spikes.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal elbow guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal elbow guards

description: Elbow guards of sheet metal, hardened to make sure you never bang your funny bone on the table again.

name.str: pair of XL sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL sheet metal arm guards

name.str: pair of XS sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS sheet metal arm guards

name.str: pair of paper arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of paper arm guards

description: Arm guards made of stacked paper sheets held together with duct tape.

name.str: pair of improvised tire arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of improvised tire arm guards

description: Arm guards made of thick chunks of tire held together with duct tape.
